title: The [Not So] Still Life
description:
Participate in the rich history of the still-life tradition. Create your own arrangements of still-life elements in this experimental gallery installation. Choose 
from a variety of objects selected for their form, material, texture, and size. Draw a picture of your still lie with materials provided in the gallery or snap a picture of the
arrangement with your phone and share it through social media to become part of a digital gallery display.
